0.3.name: wordpress/delugecc-mail-forwarding
0.3.description:
Deluge.cc is a free email forwarding service for domain owners. Forget about buying email hosting services or running SMTP servers. Deluge.cc will handle email forwarding for all of your domains.

Features include:

  • Set up a catch-all address to receive all mail sent to your domain
  • Simple API and Web interface
  • Support for unlimited domains and forwarding addresses
  • It's Free!
